overview: Port Washington, my action-adventure epic romantic comedy (and by far the most difficult project I’ve ever done) was finally finished in March of 2006 after nearly 4 years of post-production and headaches. Here you can read about the movie and check out the production log to get a feel for the process it took in bringing this beast to life. Note: There’s a lot more additional info on the new “Port Washington Site”  - Benjamin J. Heckendorn
title: Port Washington
